scripts.build: if not exist out ( mkdir out && npm run process-resume && npm run export:html && npm run export:puppeteer ) Else ( npm run process-resume && npm run export:html && npm run export:puppeteer )
scripts.deprecated:export:pdf: resume export -r out/resume.json --format pdf --theme macchiato out/export.pdf
scripts.export:puppeteer: puppeteer --margin-top 15mm --margin-right 10mm --margin-bottom 15mm --margin-left 10mm --format A4 --no-sandbox --wait-until networkidle0 print out/export.html out/emile_pommier_resume.pdf
